title: A Night with the Rock Star
description: After receiving Max's gift, his songs take on a much more personal meaning and help her think of him while he's on tour. She didn't expect for Max to come visit her again, nor did she expect for him to show up at the front door of her workplace during the middle of his tour.With Max's surprise visit, Therese decides to treat him to a place of personal significance; a place where the two can unwind in relative privacy away from the spotlights of the stage...
author: Emma  Rose
